attributes.action: reject the Eames/Bradley proposals to compensate terrorists in Northern Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Eames/Bradley report published recently suggests, amongst other things, that the families of all persons who died in the Northern Ireland "Troubles", should receive £12000.  This includes terrorists who were shot by security forces whilst engaged in murderous attacks, and bombers who accidentally killed themselves with their bombs.  This cannot be allowed to happen in a civilised and lawful society.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
